user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Decompose annual hydrogen demand figures into hourly profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios (using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios) for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Split the nodes as specified in the scenario using the splitting_pipeline.

tasks.description: Convert the output data to TST format.
